snippet: In the face of the latest upsurge of anti-American feeling in the Middle East, the U.S. is short of reliable local allies. As Washington continues to wrestle with the consequences of the Arab Spring, Morocco has emerged as an island of stability in a...
abstract: In the face of the latest upsurge of anti-American feeling in the Middle East, the U.S. is short of reliable local allies. As Washington continues to wrestle with the consequences of the Arab Spring, Morocco has emerged as an island of stability in a sea of troubles.

headline.main: Morocco Emerges as Key U.S. Ally in Troubled Region
